artist: Artist: Nicolas Africano; Publisher: Vermillion Editions Limited, Minneapolis
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated on ground fishing; tree at left, pole at right
inscription: Signature, Title, Date, Edition and Chop
markings: LR: VEL chop mark; LL in pencil: [A.P. 5/5]
signed: LL in pencil: [Nicolas Africano 1990]; at top in grey: [ An occasion for hope]
title: An Occasion for Hope, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
